attributes.background: Bring back hanging or death sentences

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure which crimes you'd like capital punishment to be allowed for.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign one of the petitions that are already open.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602482
